00053 joRefract::joRefract() : Iop()

00076 void joRefract::_validate(bool for_real)
00077 {
00078         copy_info();
00079         input1().validate( for_real );
00080         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00081         Format temp = info_.format();
00082         width = temp.width();
00083         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00084 }

00086 void joRefract::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00087 {
00088         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00089         input1().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00090 }

00092 void joRefract::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00093 {
00095         out.range( 0, width );
00097         Row in1(x, r);
00098         Row in2(x, r);
00099 
00100         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00101         input1().get(y, x, r, channels, in2);
00103         foreach (z, channels) 
00104         {
00106                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00107                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00108                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00110                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ )
00111                 {
00112 
00114                         Vector N( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00115                         Vector I( in2[Chan_Red][index], in2[Chan_Green][index], in2[Chan_Blue][index]);
00117                         if ( I.length() > 0.0001f )
00118                         {
00120                                 Vector R = I.refraction( N, 1.0f, IOR );
00122                                 if ( R.length() > 0 )
00123                                         R.normalize();
00124 
00126                                 if( fresnel )
00127                                 {
00128                                         float fresnelfake = ( 4 * IOR ) / ( ( 1 + IOR ) * ( 1 + IOR ) );
00129                                         R = R * fresnelfake;
00130                                 }
00132                                 outPixelsR[index] = R.x;
00133                                 outPixelsG[index] = R.y;
00134                                 outPixelsB[index] = R.z;
00135 
00136                         } 
00137                         else
00138                         {
00139                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00140                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00141                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00142                         }
00143                 }
00144                 
00145         }
00146 }
